key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and potential legal challenges
High dependence on discretionary spending for live events
Intense competition from established market players
Consumer trust issues related to pricing transparency and hidden fees
Vulnerability to external disruptions in the live events industry
controversies: Class action lawsuit in New York alleging failure to disclose total ticket costs upfront
Historical concerns about ticket authenticity and scalping
social_issues: Potential impact on customer loyalty due to hidden fees and pricing transparency issues
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks and potential legal liabilities
